Issue.description: Our claims and proofs don't look like the Verifiable Claims spec. They should follow the VC spec with a special CL (Camenisch-Lysyanskaya) type signature.h4. Plan of Attack|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1GrA_ah-rRtwjeEYipDtF4sV30JdapbQq6CdUqEtYYl0/edit
